Text: RE Internet outage PM Tonight and Tomorrow Cc PST Testing done Scheduled to upgrade PGE firewall Thursday pm central Jon W Original Message From Steiner David Sent Wednesday May PM To Portland West Desk Cc Cox Chip Werner Jon Subject Internet outage PM Tonight and Tomorrow Importance High Internet Outage There will be a very temporary seconds or so internet outage at pm tonight as we switch from using the PGE route to the Enron Houston route The IT contact for tonight is Chip Cox PGE is doing maintenance on their firewall tomorrow and to avoid a prolonged outage we will be using a different path to the internet Tonight we are just testing the alternate path and will be back on the PGE route around PM tonight after testing Tomorrow around PM we will once again reroute our traffic to Enron Houstons Internet path while the PGE route is down for about hours This will again cause a very brief outage that will most likely go unnoticed by most After PGE has completed their work we will jump back over to their service Please let me know if you have any questions Dave Steiner
